name: Idol Tower:make your own idol
description:
Are you a K-pop fan?
Well, groups like BTS, Shinee, Super Junior and Black Pink all come from top agencies.
Become a CEO of a top agency today by training your own idol and building an Idol Tower!

-This easy money clicker game was made for you!
Just click and tap once. Then, you will be able to build and provide a nice, spacious tower for your idol.

-Enjoy every location and features of the Idol Tower:
cafeteria, fitting room, gym, choreography room, recording studio, and even your own CEO office!

The more popular your idol gets, more money will be rolling in so that you can improve your building.


*Get your name on the top weekly ranking chart and receive some chamsim bonus that can be used on Idol Champ(app) to vote for your actual favorite k-pop star! :)

#kpop, idol, bts, shinee, black pink, tapping game, money clicker, game, idol tower, fun game, easy game, idol champ, Idolchampawards, super junior, bias, idol game, idollove
